import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Lock, User as UserIcon, Eye, EyeOff, ChevronDown } from 'lucide-react'; export function LoginScreen({ onLogin }) { const [username, setUsername] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [selectedRole, setSelectedRole] = useState('doctor'); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const [rememberMe, setRememberMe] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onLogin({ id: `user-${Date.now()}`, name: username || 'Demo User', role: selectedRole }); }; const roleLabels = { nurse: 'Nurse', doctor: 'Doctor', admin: 'Admin', pharmacy: 'Pharmacy' }; return (
